p: Thus, cumin cakes may have potential uses in various food formulations, showing improved digestibility and good nutritional composition. Different sources of cakes have been used for protein fortification in bread and therefore increased the nutritional and technological attributes [ 4, 5]. Cumin, fennel and caraway cakes supply resulted in higher nutritional values, antioxidant activities and acceptability by a panel of consumers [ 4, 71, 72].
